items.title: Complete siege of the Gaza Strip
items.content_html: Israel's Defence Minister Yoav Gallant had ordered “a complete siege of the Gaza Strip,” home to 2.2 million Palestinians, nearly half of them children. “There will be no electricity, no food, no fuel, everything is closed,” he said. “We are fighting human animals, and we act accordingly.”
